title: Ben Shapiro as a host can't contain Jordan Peterson
description:
Original video https://youtu.be/WT0mbNvaT6Y 

My introductory video to this one. https://youtu.be/NJ-3FMkfCMY 

I almost never edit anything but a bit after I finished this video I had a few other thoughts on it that I attached to the back end of it. You'll see the cut. 

This video impacted me in a funny way and I'm still not quite sure how.
